Texts.Chs: 一个可爱的高山种植箱。在雪地里看起来更好！
Texts.Eng: A delightful alpine planter box. It looks even better in the snow!

Texts.Chs: 一棵快乐的小松树，周围是一品红。这是一个风景如画的假日景象。
Texts.Eng: A merry little pine tree, surrounded by poinsettias. It makes for a picturesque holiday scene.

Texts.Chs: 现在已经是假期了吗？也许我应该在这里留下一些礼物...
Texts.Eng: Is it holiday season already? Maybe I should leave some presents here...

Texts.Chs: 这里的花盆里有一些顽强的植物。这里的雪一点也不困扰他们。
Texts.Eng: Some mighty hardy plants in this here planter. The snow here ain't botherin' them none.

Texts.Chs: 尽管下着雪，这个花盆盒子里的树似乎一直是绿色的...不可思议的。
Texts.Eng: The tree in this planter box appears to be ever green despite the snow... Marvelous.

Texts.Chs: 这个花盆看起来像故事书里的东西。或者是颂歌。
Texts.Eng: This planter looks like something out of a storybook. Or maybe a carol.

Texts.Chs: 多么令人愉快的一幕啊。雪更增添了魅力。
Texts.Eng: What a pleasant little scene. The snow just adds to the charm.
